changeSet.author: tmcfarlin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `prodlims`.`parentkit_data` ( `id` bigint(20) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `casefile_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `collection_date` datetime NULL, `third_party_patient_id` varchar(55) NULL, `medical_record_number` varchar(55) NULL, `gestational_age` int NULL, `genetic_age_mother` int NULL, `expected_due_date` datetime NULL, `gestational_age_loss` int NULL, CONSTRAINT `parentkit_data_casefile_id` FOREIGN KEY (`casefile_id`) REFERENCES `casefile` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
